ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Venril
ygData.msgSnippet: If it s lifetap you need to have the bards sing Purifying Rhytms I would also throw in Hymn and Nivs and the 50+ healing song as well.  That should help to
ygData.messageBody:
If it's lifetap you need to have the bards sing "Purifying Rhytms" I would
also throw in Hymn and Nivs and the 50+ healing song as well. That should
help to counter the lifetap nicely. Alternately sing Purifying Rhythms, FCC
and TCF. Also any poison resist spells your clerics/shaman/druids can cast
on you. Lifetap is a Poison Resist Check.

Maestro of Rancor uses a Lifetap type spell that does nearly as much dmg
which is area affect and using poison resistance gear/songs/spells people
can usually take him down without too much trouble.

Good luck!

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
<Travelers of Norrath>
Saryrn Server
----- Original Message -----
From: "J.R. Hyde" <junk@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 8:22 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Venril


> We took 36ish people to take him on after the patch and the amount of
sheer
> "ownage" had us all laughing our asses off. If this had been nagafen we
> woulda spanked him soundly with zero deaths and clerics all at 50% mana.
>
> It wasnt nagafen it was Venril unfortunately. He methodically knocked out
> the tanks one by one in such a systematic manor that everybody was just
> waiting their time patiently to die. Nuke's hit him for full damage and
his
> 320 melee is laughable. But his 2k'ish lifetap every few seconds just
> decimated us one by one till we called evac on the one group remaining. We
> all had over 200mr thanks to the bards and enchanter buffs but it made
> little to no difference. He was at either 90% to FH when it was all over.
>
> As far as strategy, all i can think of since mr didnt seem to do anything
is
> figuring out whether his lifetap is a spell or a proc. If it its a spell
> then mana drains are the order of the day, if its a proc, then we have to
> get turgurs on him before anybody bothers nuking or hittin him. I tried my
> Brusco's stun on him and he just resisted (stuck on lvl 60 ancient wyv's
> np), same with fear. Maybe stuns will stick if you have enough being
casted
> on him, but either way you have to prevent that "You feel a tugging at
your
> soul" from going off.
>
> Anybody has any luck or knows any strategy suggestions please share =)
>
> Gendal Concorden, lvl 55 Bard of Talisman - Tunare
>
>
